name: Beehaw!
description:
Beehaw Jones, the hero of our eponymous tale, has returned to his hive after tiring day of pollen farming to find it looted by the evil Wasperados! With a sigh, Beehaw grabs his trusty six-shooter and sets out to exact his vengeance on his foes. Help Beehaw hunt down the dastardly Wasperado and show him why Beehaw Jones is known far and wide as the rootinest, shootinest, cowbee this side of the Rio Grande!

Keyboard controls:
WASD/Arrow Keys - Move left & right,
Space - Jump,
Left Control - Shoot,
Left Alt - Reload,
Tab - Pause.

Gamepad controls (Xbox layout):
Left Joystick - Move left & right,
A Button - Jump,
X Button - Shoot,
B Button - Reload,
Menu Button - Pause.
